mapper.insert: insert into order_product (product_id, order_id, count, delete_time, update_time) values (#{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deleteTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select product_id, order_id, count, delete_time, update_time from order_product
